Repeat: k3 wrapping yarn twice around needle for each stitch; k3
sl 3 long stitches wyib, dropping the extra loops; p3
slip the slip stitches wyib, knit the knit stitches
slip the slip stitches wyib, purl the purl stitches
slip 3 stitches to dpn and hold in back; k3 long stitches wrapping the yarn around the needle twice; k3 from dpn
End Row: k3 long stitches wrapping yarn around needle twice, k1

Repeat: slip the long stitches, dropping the extra loops; p3
End Row: slip 3 long stitches dropping the extra loops, p1

Repeat: slip the slip stitches wyib, knit the knit stitches
slip the slip stitches wyib, purl the purl stitches
slip 3 stitches to dpn and hold in back; k3 long stitches wrapping the yarn around the needle twice; k3 from dpn
sl 3 long stitches wyib, dropping the extra loops; p3
slip the slip stitches wyib, knit the knit stitches
slip the slip stitches wyib, purl the purl stitches
